disketaa_radial-shadow.name: Radial shadow
disketaa_radial-shadow.description: Creates a radial shadow underneath the object.

shadow_color.name: Color
shadow_color.desc: Sets the color of the shadow.

shadow_opacity.name: Opacity
shadow_opacity.desc: Adjusts the opacity of the shadow.

sharpness.name: Sharpness
sharpness.desc: Controls the hardness of the shadow edges.

horizontal_center.name: Horizontal center
horizontal_center.desc: Sets the horizontal pivot point for scaling.

vertical_center.name: Vertical center
vertical_center.desc: Sets the vertical pivot point for scaling.

horizontal_scale.name: Horizontal scale
horizontal_scale.desc: Adjusts the horizontal scale of the shadow.

vertical_scale.name: Vertical scale
vertical_scale.desc: Adjusts the vertical scale of the shadow.

horizontal_offset.name: Horizontal offset
horizontal_offset.desc: Sets the horizontal offset of the shadow relative to the object.

vertical_offset.name: Vertical offset
vertical_offset.desc: Sets the vertical offset of the shadow relative to the object.
